CheckTitle: SSH access is restricted from the internet
Description: Security groups provide stateful filtering of ingress/egress network traffic to Alibaba Cloud resources. It is recommended that no security group allows unrestricted ingress access to port 22 (SSH).
Risk: Removing unfettered connectivity to remote console services, such as SSH, reduces a server's exposure to risk.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to ECS Console. In the left-side navigation pane, choose Network & Security > Security Groups. Find the Security Group you want to modify. Modify Source IP range to specific IP instead of 0.0.0.0/0. Save.
